description:
This time, it`s the True History about Halloween. However, the place they arrive is the Tottori Desert in the 4th year of the Meiji Era. Tokio and Calen meet the host, Fukuzawa-san, who they think they`ve seen before. Apparently people mistake Tottori and Shimane quite often, so he holds a quiz about them. It starts on October 31st... Wait, does that mean "trick or treat" was originally "Tottori or Shimane"? Akudarma won`t allow for such a punny history, so they also participate in the quiz...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Halloween no Trick or Treat wa Tottori or Shimane Datta!
Halloween`s Trick or Treat Was Actually Tottori or Shimane!
ハロウィンのトリック・オア・トリートは鳥取or島根だった!
